nodes.text: An instructor taught at the Chiss Ascendancy's Taharim Academy on Naporar. The instructor frequently quoted an old saying that claimed that the sky was always darkest just before it went completely black. Both Admiral Ar'alani and Senior Captain Kiwu'tro'owmis had the instructor during their time at the academy. The two quoted the instructor's words when they were called to represent Senior Captain Mitth'raw'nuruodo at a tribunal for his strategic actions during an attack on the Paataatus homeworld.
